about_the_game:
It's Harvest time is a simple 2d-puzzle casual game.

Take control of a farmstead on the countryside, where farmlife is simple.
Protect the farm animals at the bottom of the game board from wild animals spawning at the top.

Collect wood and stone that can be used to build and upgrade the farm with improved fences.
Gather gold coins to upgrade the farm with extensions that upgrades the farm with various passive stats.

Swords are used to attack incoming wild animals, like rats, foxes and wolves.

At the moment 5 levels are playable.
Get at least 1 star on a level to unlock the next one, - each with its own set of creatures and wildlife.

At the countryside, the sun shines down onto those that manages the farmstead with strength and a steady pitchfork.

Become a farmer today!

name: It's Harvest Time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1366x768 min resolution - recommended graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 31 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: In general all 16:9 and 16:10 screen resolutions are supported. Even though the game could work on other screen resolutions - it is not guaranteed that things will look decent. Playing the game on lower than 1366x768 is dissuaded.

short_description: It's Harvest time is a simple 2d puzzle casual game. Be the simple farmer at a farmstead on the countryside. Build and upgrade the farm. Protect the farm animals from wild animals.
